description: To provide remedial excavation services in Fort Simpson, NWT, for contaminated northern sites. The procurement process is outlined in Part 6 - Supply Arrangement and Resulting Contract Clauses. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.
full_summary:
### ET022-241012 - Fort Simpson Remedial Excavations
#### Request for Proposal
**Reference Number:** WS4681885367
**Publication Date:** July 12, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** July 30, 2024 (14:00:00)
#### Solicitation Summary
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites experienced contractors to submit a proposal for remedial excavation services at the Fort Simpson site in the Northwest Territories.

**Supply Arrangement Background**
This request is a call for proposal to a select group of pre-qualified suppliers who have a current arrangement for remediation construction services for northern contaminated sites within the South West administrative zone, based on the EW479-192534 request for supply arrangement (RFSA).

**Bidder Eligibility**
Bidders must be one of the pre-qualified suppliers under the EW479-192534 RFSA and hold a valid standing offer.

**Proposal Submission Guidelines**
To submit a proposal, bidders must follow the instructions outlined in Part 6 - Supply Arrangement and Resulting Contract Clauses, B. Bid Solicitation.

**Services Required**
PSPC seeks a contractor to provide remedial excavation services at the Fort Simpson site in the Northwest Territories.

**Proposal Evaluation**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Debriefing**
Bidders who wish to receive a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation must request one within 15 working days of receiving notification of the results.

**Contracting Entity**
PSPC
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
Amanda Jordan (SPAC/PSPC) 
amanda.jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca 

#### Important Details
- **UNSPSC Code:** 76100000 (Decontamination services)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 1, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** November 15, 2024
- **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada 
#### Contact Information
Jordan, Amanda (SPAC/PSPC)
amanda.jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
